member.name: SID_AND_ATTRIBUTES
member.summary: The SID_AND_ATTRIBUTES structure represents a security identifier (SID) and its attributes. SIDs are used to uniquely identify users or groups.

member.name: SID_AND_ATTRIBUTES.Attributes
member.summary: Specifies attributes of the SID. This value contains up to 32 one-bit flags. Its meaning depends on the definition and use of the SID.
